author: djencks
msg: Add a gbeans:list console command.  Don't stop gbeans that successfully started in a configuration

author: djencks
msg: update to use boot features instead of startup.properties

author: djencks
msg: get the attribute manager working as a service.  Add support for wrapping services as gbeans.  Make ConfigurationExtender asynchronous to avoid deadlocks with blueprint

author: djencks
msg: remove some xpp cruft. reduce use of ConfigurationManager.  Split configuration startup into load gbeans and start gbeans so loaded gbean metadatas are available in kernel
